title: Bots (AI players)
body:
I'm sure some of you summoners have seen bots/AI in your games who simply feed the enemy team or just run in circles, annoying right?
Well I've found something in common with one type of bot that people have been using which isn't exactly useful but may help you identify at the start of the game that you've got a bot in your game. Boots. Just... boots. I've noticed the bots buy boots as their first item. And thats about it :P.

Now onto the question. Are bots allowed? Can people use bots to play, I don't believe so as it can create an unfair advantage for either team depending if the bot is smart or not :D. If not is there a way of reporting bots as I don't remember seeing it as a reportable offence when reporting a player.

replies.body: The bot did end up doing better than the ADC X3.

Hey summoner, 

Botting is 100% not allowed in games, and should be reported so the accounts scripts like this can get weeded out faster. When reporting players for this particular offense, you can report them under the "3rd party software" category as well as the "griefing" one since the bots do tend to feed.
